Interface IContextValidationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContextValidationService

    public interface IContextValidationService
    Generic context validation service interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<BeanValidationStatus> validate(IValidationContext<?> context, IdentifiedBean bean, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Validates the bean against the specified context and returns the result.
      List<BeanValidationStatus> validate(IValidationContext<?> context, String terminologyComponentId, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Validates the contents of the specified context and returns the result.
